name: Pathways (Mr.Me)
description: Use arrow keys to move. You can only walk onto paths that are facing your square. To spin a tile, mouse over it and scroll up or down but you cannot spin the tile you're standing on. The twist: You can drag from one tile to another in a square patern. That will highlight the square in red and you can spin the whole thing! Try to get to the finish and beat all 6 levels!
